Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: The best pizza I have ever had!! People are super nice, food is so delicious, the place feels super cozy! I loved this place!!

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Update Nov 2019: Came back here 4 years later. Great service but the vegetarian lasagna that I loved so much changed. The sauce is still amazing but there were hardly any vegetables in it. Instead, it was more like a ‚Äúcheese lasagna‚Äù than ‚Ä¶

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: I had a great Pesto tagliatelle! Love the service, the food, the place and the location! Feels like Italy

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text:
French boy here.
Polite and fast service.
The portions are generous. (lot of meat in the con Carne !) ‚Ä¶

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Great pizza.. went with a group of 22 people, unexpected but they managed it very well. Everybody happy

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Excellent food, service and atmosphere. Very good casual Italian restaurant.   Will definitely go back.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Had a great experience, that waiters were very kind and calm and the food was above all the charts.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text:
They are good guys, the pasta is good and the prices are right.
Now we take the bruschette, they are amazing tasty.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Good and affordable Italian food by real Italians. Friendly service.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: We were looking for a family restaurant in the area. We were not interested in the usual American fast food ones, but too fashion either. Trattoria Fantasia was just the right choice: children enjoyed their delicious pastas and risottos and ‚Ä¶

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Excellent and authentic Italian food and very friendly staff. You could ask for free tap water. We really enjoyed our experience here and will surely be back!

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Very fast and friendly service. Had the pizza Margarita which was more American style than Italian style. Loads of white cheese and thick, chewy crust.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: The bruschetta was disappointing :( the pizza was nice and the tiramisu was good as well. The staff were friendly...Overall, an Ok place to visit in Amsterdam.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Spaghetti Cabonara was absolutely delicious! Plus a double serving of Jack Daniels and coke made my day!! Top Restraunt!!

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Amazing foodüòç cozy spot by the centraal view and super friendly staff!  Recommended to all

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: The restaurant is an overall pleasant experience, with friendly staff and very good food. If you're a pizza lover or know of one, do yourself a favour and check it out. They also have outstanding vegan choices, such as the grilled vegetable ‚Ä¶

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Very cosy, friendly staff. Great food!

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Strange that the impression on the website of the restaurant is about how it looks instead of how the food looks... Isn't the place about food?

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Read good reviews but heart sank when it appeared almost empty on arrival, especially as so many other places were busy and lively.  Food was great (had pizza) and it did start to fill up soon after we arrived.  Great for a quieter meal but not for those wanting to sit outside and watch the world as you eat.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Delicious pizza, thin base with crispy crust and plenty of toppings. Good selection of food, not huge but definitely catering to everyone. Plenty of wine and beer to try and a good atmosphere. Staff were attentive and friendly.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Romantic and relaxed Italian restaurant. Good prices and a medium length menu for every taste. The pizza I had was big and OK in taste compared to some of the other pizza restaurants in Amsterdam for the same price, but my partner had a really good tasting pasta dish.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Good quality pizza's for a good price. Made an error in supplying the wrong pizza for my friend. She had to wait 15 min while I ate. We were ok with it since we shared. The waiter seemed really embarrassed and compensated us with discount and offered us drink from the house. We didn't take the offer though. The waiter was lovely

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: A very nice and cozy place. service ad food take their time - but worth it, as it is as Italian as you can have in Amsterdam, and priced low for its quality. service is free from pretentious, friendly and generous. a perfect choice for dinner - friends or date. Wouldn't go with kids due to the relaxed timings.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Cozy place, good service. They have an adorable cat named Olivia inside. Pizzas are quite big and might be challenging to finish for some, but they are good.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Staff were very friendly. We had pizzas, which were great. Plenty of topping. Cute ginger cat came and set by us while we ate. Very well behaved, didn't try to steal the food, just wanted petting.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Great pizza! The only thing was that they forgot to bring us our desert. When we told them they offered us the desert for free, but we were tired of waiting, so we decided to leave. Still 5 stars, because the food was excellent and would definitely recommend it!

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Pretty good food for a decent price. Would of got 5 stars if I didnt have the waiter hanging over me waiting for me to finish and leave as the place was fairly quiet. All customer service issues aside great food tbh

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Typical Italian restaurant you will find anywhere in Italy, but this one is in Amsterdam. Really good.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Great food, quick service, and the house cat who will visit if it is not very busy. What more could you want? Highly recommend, especially early in the evening on a week day.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Fantastic food for a very great price. I was really surprised how large the portions were too. Would absolutely recommend. Service was kind and accommodating as well.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: We had pasta with pesto and pizza margherita. The guy working there was very nice and very service oriented. Food was good and cheap. If there was to complain for anything the pasta with pesto hadn't so much salt.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: We made a last-minute reservation on a Friday night for 24 people, and Trattoria Fantasia accommodated amazingly. All dishes were served almost simultaneously, the bill was correct, and ultimately inexpensive to boot. Thanks for a wonderful night, we will certainly return!

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Great place, unpretentious with great tasting food. Make sure you stay for dessert as well, you won't regret it. This place is rarely busy, so feel free to just walk in and ask for a table. This place is also great for groups for whatever occasion - a date, an anniversary, celebrating somebody's birthday, or just a night out.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Reminds me when I was in Italy pizza was great! And Desert perfect. Prices are average Amsterdam prices. They have a cat so that means it‚Äôs a good restaurant ;)

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: AMAZING FOOD!!! Really good service too, although we were the only people in the restaurant sadly (too bad for everyone who couldn‚Äôt enjoy it with us) At least we got to have the adorable chubby chonk (cat) all to ourselves!

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Service wasn‚Äôt good and food was disappointing, bet the pizza was a frozen one from the supermarket.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Cute place but my first time going i ordered the risotto, it was nice but i got food poisening after. So im not going there again!!

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Bruschetta was quite dry with no cheese and not enough olive oil. Special dish was chestnut & truffle ravioli which was OK, but came a bit cold and definitely not worth 18euros! Caneloni was OK, but forgettable. Wine was good.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: The service was atrocious. There were only 3 tables in the restaurant but due to, what I can only put down to the fact we did not speak Italian, we barely made it on to the waiter's priority list. While our nearest table had been served and ‚Ä¶

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Completely horrible. Had a "lasagne", pure pasta with a tad of tasteless sauce on top. My friend had a pizza with a bad bottom, but at least he got some food out of it. ‚Ä¶

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: The pizza was great but the server was a little cold towards us.  Restaurant was quiet at the time we went, just one more couple apart from us.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: The food was good, and decently priced although it needed a bit of salt. :) had the arrabiatta and carbonara. the waiter (owner?) was very friendly and accommodating. Would come back just for that.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: The pizza is always good and fast when order online  ! Just The lady waitress was kinda B  and we felt like leaving at one point, her responds were rude & offensive , am not sure if I will go there again but chances unless not while she‚Äôs there

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Drinks were good and staff were friendly and helpful. The risotto and pastas were had though were an embarrassment to Italian cuisine. Risotto was essentially overcooked rice with mushrooms and water, no stock or seasoning at all.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text:
Very good to excellent.
The  Baked Lasagna  Bolonaise was a real treat, went back twice to make sure it was that good. ‚Ä¶

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: I had the bruschetta and ceaser salad to start, followed by pizza and finally tiramisu and espresso. All were OK at best - nothing too bad but definitely nothing to shout about. Staff were friendly.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text:
Just a typical low quality tur√≠stic pizzeria... Close to the downtown.
But the pizza is not bad.
For sure that there are better options, but if you want to stay in a quite place, this is your place....
#LetsGuide

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Average is a good word. Friendly, clean, solid pasta, pizza a bit boring. You won't make a mistake going here but it ain't special either

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: 5 Stars for this restaurant. Such good dishes. I wish i could be here more often.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: The personnel is definitely friendly, food is below my own expectations. Definitely not "real" italian food. If you are hungry then it is worth for a consideration.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: The food was really good. I just can‚Äôt say the same thing regarding the table service. I was obligated to change the table 2 times.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Restaurant very nice & clean. Staff is super friendly. Food excellent. Affordale price. 5 stars is a must

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Amazing food! One of the best meals we had in Amsterdam, would definitely recommend.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Nice place, not great but still good.  Caprese Salad was very good, tortalini with cherry tomatoes and ham was Ok.  Service was good. Prices were reasonable for a sit down restaurant.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Best seafood pizza I've ever had! Amazing service! Will be back again ;)

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: One of the best Italian restaurant! Food was really good, services also.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Absolutely loved this place. It is well worth the price as the food is top quality and the decor is decent and cosy with very attentive staff.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Great service by Hakan, very friendly! Very comfortable place, delicious food. Cute cat too

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Fantastic value for money. Quick and friendly service, better than most eateries near leideseplein which often are more expensive and lower quality.

Name: Fantasia Trattoria
Review Text: Great atmosfer. Deliciuse food. Couldn't stop eat. Everything we ask they give us  emidietly. Great service. ABSULUTLY  GREAT PLACE !!!

Review Text: Really a nice place. Best expresso in Amsterdam and  very well prepared bisteka and peni  a putanesca.  Staff so kindly.  One of the owners serving.
